examples.instruction: Extract structured information from this noisy OCR text and return a JSON object with name, dob, and id_number fields.
examples.input:
Nam: Priya
Dat of Brith: 13/04/2002
ID no: 1234-5678-9101

examples.instruction: Convert this OCR text from an ID card into structured JSON format.
examples.input:
Name: John D0e
Date 0f Birth: 25-12-1990
Identity Number: ABC123456789

examples.instruction: Parse this messy OCR output and extract the required fields as JSON.
examples.input:
FULL NAME: Sarah Chen
B0RN: 08/03/1985
ID: XYZ-987-654-321
